title: [Large-scale] Deep Learning Design Strategies for Improving the Quality of Online Open Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific knowledge and intermediate job-related expertise
context.additional_context: In digital device-provided environments, project-based assessments and enhanced online-offline interaction are necessary.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze qualitative elements of online courses using mixed research methodologies (surveys and interviews)
Learners can apply design principles that promote deep learning (e.g., scaffolding strategies) to actual educational designs
Learners can develop project-based assessment tools that strengthen 21st-century competencies (critical thinking, problem-solving)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
